summary: Microsoft Office, or simply Office, is a popular software package developed by Microsoft. It was first introduced in 1988 and included word processing, spreadsheet, and presentation programs. Over time, it has grown to include more applications like Outlook and OneDrive. Office is available for different users and devices, such as Windows, macOS, Android, and iOS. You can use it online or as a desktop version. Microsoft also offers a subscription service called Microsoft 365 (formerly Office 365) for continuous updates and additional features.
title: Microsoft Office
